org.apache.lenya.cms.repo
Interface SiteNode

All Known Implementing Classes:
SiteNodeProxy
public interface SiteNode

A site node, which represents a site (subsite) itself.

Method Summary

Method Detail

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
                         throws RepositoryException
Returns:
The name, which corresponds to the URL snippet.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

getChildren

public SiteNode[] getChildren()
                       throws RepositoryException
Returns:
The top level nodes in this area.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

preOrder

public SiteNode[] preOrder()
                    throws RepositoryException
Returns:
All nodes in this subtree, including the node itself.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

                         Asset contentNode)
                  throws RepositoryException
Parameters:

Returns:
a site node.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

getPath

public java.lang.String getPath()
                         throws RepositoryException
Returns:
The path of the node, relative to the area.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

getAsset

public Asset getAsset()
               throws RepositoryException
Returns:
The referenced content node.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

getParent

public SiteNode getParent()
                   throws RepositoryException
Returns:
The parent node or null if this is a top-level node.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

getSite

public Site getSite()
             throws RepositoryException
Returns:
The site this node belongs to.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

remove

public void remove()
            throws RepositoryException
Removes the node and all its child nodes.

Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

                 throws RepositoryException
Checks if the node has a certain child.

Parameters:

Returns:
A boolean value.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.
